DOC.criteria: Inclusion/ Confirmed diagnosis elevate level prolactin measure via blood test MRI image confirm pituitary abnormality microprolactinoma ( < 10 mm ) . Patients macroprolactinoma exclude . history medication reaction require emergency medical care , illicit drug use , excessive alcohol consumption ( < 10 drinks/week ) , currently seek fertility , breastfeed pregnant Physical Examination : normal blood pressure , ( systolic BP < 140 mm Hg , diastolic < 90 mm Hg ) . Laboratory Studies : white blood cell , platelet count , TSH 90 % low limit 110 % upper limit reference range , hemoglobin le 0.5 gm/dL low limit reference range normal woman , BUN , creatinine , AST , ALT elevate , negative serum human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) pregnancy test time screening ( additional urine pregnancy test conduct prior drug administration ) .
